content:
1. Simplified navigation menu structure: In Twenty Thirteen, the navigation menu structure has been simplified compared to Twenty Twelve. The `.menu-toggle` button is removed, and the menu is rendered directly inside the `
` element with an ID of `site-navigation`. This simplification streamlines the menu structure and makes it more straightforward to understand and customize. Twenty Twelve: ```html
컨텐츠로 건너뛰기
    ...
``` Twenty Thirteen: ```html
``` The changes from Twenty Twelve to Twenty Thirteen reflect an evolution in design and user experience, with a focus on improving accessibility, simplifying the structure, and streamlining the code for easier customization.
